casebody.data:
Third Department,

November, 1972

(November 1, 1972) Paul F. Shappet, Jr., Appellant, v. State of New York, Respondent. (Claim No. 44793.)

Judgment, Court of Claims, entered on March 3, 1967, affirmed, without costs (see Whitree v. State of New York, 26 A D 2d 720, mot. for lv. to app. den. 18 N Y 2d 583). No opinion. Herlihy, P. J., Staley, Jr., Greenblott, Kane and Reynolds, JJ., concur.
